biography: Tomas, a familiar name at the Hector Trophée from Espoo Ringside Golf, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. While some might see him as reserved, those who know him well understand that his quiet demeanor masks a fierce competitive spirit and a deep passion for golf.

Tomas has participated in 3 previous Hector Trophée tournaments. Despite not securing a victory at the event nor winning an individual Victor trophy, Tomas has consistently demonstrated skill and sportsmanship. His presence has always been appreciated by fellow competitors and spectators alike.

Although Tomas is currently considered retired from Hector Trophée events, his contributions to the tournament are memorable. While he is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, the possibility of a return, however slim, remains open. His fans and fellow golfers will undoubtedly watch with interest, should he decide to once again grace the fairways of the Hector Trophée.
